name: Light and Spicy Fish
author: ADAMS8192
summary: This recipe is easy to make and very healthy. You may substitute other firm fleshed fish such as ocean perch or grouper.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place a sheet of aluminum foil onto a baking sheet, and grease lightly
Place fillets onto the foil, and sprinkle with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Spoon picante sauce over fillets, and squeeze lime juice over the top
Bring the sides of the foil together, and fold the seam to seal in the fish
Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork
